attributes.action: Improve all border controls, to use the latest technology to scan figerprints and Iris scanning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Improve all border controls, to use the latest technology to scan figerprints and Iris scanning, linking to a worldwide network to deteremine who is entry or exciting the UK
All residents or non residents to be scannned entrying or exciting the UK, TO HELP WITH THE FIGHT WITH TERRORIST OR ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
